src:
Tigri s Cedevito
07 Nov 2019, 15:10 by Rok Maver

V nedeljo ob 20. uri bo v koprski dvorani Bonifika drugi zaporedni slovenski derbi regionalne košarkarske lige. Dvoboj Primorske in Cedevite Olimpije obeta napeto tekmo.



Tribune v Bonifiki bodo v nedeljo najbrž polne. Foto: Zdravko Primožič/FPA

KOPER > Koprski novinec med regionalno košarkarsko elito se zelo dobro drži, saj je v vodilni skupini štirih ekip z razmerjem v zmagah in porazih 4:1. V nedeljo ob 20. uri pa se v dvorani Bonifika obeta še dodatna poslastica - ponovitev finala minulega državnega prvenstva.
Oba kluba sta poleti spremenila imeni: Sixt Primorska je postal Koper Primorska, Olimpija pa je doživela korenite spremembe, saj je po izpadu iz lige Aba 1 prevzela tekmovalno licenco zagrebške Cedevite in postala Cedevita Olimpija. Tako se je po bližnjici vrnila med elito v regiji in v evropski pokal.
Koprska ekipa je bolj uigrana od ljubljanske, ki pa je individualno bolj kakovostna, zagotovo pa dražja. Vse bosta ekipi potrdili ali ovrgli na parketu. Predprodaja vstopnic poteka na spletu. Do sobote opolnoči je cena osem evrov, na dan tekme pa deset evrov.
text:
Tigers with Cedevita
07 Nov 2019, 15:10 by Rock Maver

On Sunday at 8 pm the Bonifika Hall of Koper will be the second consecutive Slovenian basketball basketball derby. Primorska and Cedevita Olympia promise a tense match.



The stands in Bonifica are likely to be full on Sunday. Photo: Zdravko Primozic / FPA

KOPER> The Koper rookie among the regional basketball elite holds up very well, as he is in the leading group of four teams with a 4-1 win / loss ratio. On Sunday at 8pm, an additional treat is expected in the Bonifika Hall - a repeat of the finals of the last national championship.
Both clubs changed their names in the summer: Sixt Primorska became Koper Primorska, and Olympia underwent a dramatic change as it acquired the competing license from Zagreb's Cedevita to become a Cedevita Olympia after releasing Aba 1. Thus, after a shortcut, she returned among the elite in the region and into the European Cup.
The Koper team is more playful than the Ljubljana team, which is individually better quality and certainly more expensive. The teams will either confirm or refute all of them on the parquet floor. Tickets are pre-sold online. Until Saturday midnight, the price is eight euros, and on the day of the match it is ten euros.
